survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Plant Nurseries
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers regarding their satisfaction with online plant nurseries, including purchase experience, plant quality, and delivery services.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your recent purchase from an online plant nursery?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your recent purchase from an online plant nursery?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors influenced your decision to purchase from the online plant nursery? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand key decision-making factors.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors influenced your decision to purchase from the online plant nursery? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the plants you received?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to assess plant quality.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the plants you received?

questions.question_text: Did the plants arrive in good condition?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/partially question to gauge delivery condition.

script.question_text: Did the plants arrive in good condition?

questions.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered with your order.
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'No' or 'Partially' to Q4
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specific issues.

script.question_text: Please describe any issues you encountered with your order.
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'No' or 'Partially' to Q4

questions.question_text: How likely are you to purchase from this online plant nursery again?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure repeat purchase intent.

script.question_text: How likely are you to purchase from this online plant nursery again?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the online plant nursery?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the online plant nursery?
